title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
Introducing our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set of 16! This is the perfect gift for your loved ones, whether it's for your Mother, Wife, Daughter, or Friend. 

With a variety of 16 delightful scents to choose from, including Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia, there's a scent for every mood and occasion.

These candles are made with natural soy wax and infused with essential oils, ensuring a clean and long-lasting burn. Each candle has a burn time of 18-20 hours, providing hours of soothing and relaxing ambiance.

The candles come in a convenient and portable tin can, making them easy to carry and perfect for travel. The tin cans are not only recyclable but can also be repurposed as a flowerpot or home decoration, adding a touch of elegance to any space.

Safety is our top priority, so remember to keep the candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.

Don't miss out on this amazing gift set that will bring joy and relaxation to your loved ones. Order our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set of 16 today!

The tin can containers not only add a touch of elegance but are also recyclable, making them a sustainable choice for the environmentally conscious. And don't worry, these versatile tins can be repurposed as flowerpots or home decorations once the candles are finished.

Safety is our top priority, so please keep the candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.
